name: Autocomplete should match entries with spaces

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Update notes:
Steve Mudie — Friday, September 18, 2020 3:20 PM
• Added links

inline.description:
Autocomplete should match entries with spaces
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Create a channel with the name e.g. Ask Anything
  2. Add channel purpose e.g for asking any questions
  3. Navigate to any channel and type ~for asking
inline.expectedResult: • Autocomplete should allow space character and not close after space is typed for as long as there are matching entries

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Story) Repeat the steps using @ name last name e.g. @ john smith — MM-19761

inline.description: 1. Repeat the steps using @ name last name e.g. @ john smith
inline.expectedResult: • Should be allowed to use spaces between first and last name, as long as there are matching users autocomplete should not close after space character
